<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Sludgespine Killers](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1934)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 25</row>

**Perception** +5

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Gnoll](/Languages.aspx?ID=17)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +5, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +4, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Items**
[Bola](/Weapons.aspx?ID=92) (2), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Sap](/Weapons.aspx?ID=37)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +5 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 8

**Weeping Wounds** The fluid in a Sludgespine's pustules is harmful to other creatures. Whenever a creature hits a Sludgespine killer with a melee attack, the attacker must succeed at a DC 14 Reflex save or take 1 acid damage (2 acid damage on a critical failure).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +6 ([Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sap +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d6 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bola +5 ([Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [range 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Ranged Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=251), [Thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6 bludgeoning

**Pack Attack**   A gnoll deals 1d4 extra damage to any creature that's within reach of at least two of the gnoll's allies.

**Stealthy Abduction**   When a Sludgespine killer successfully [Grapples](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) a creature, that creature makes no sound; other creatures can't notice the grapple by hearing alone. As long as it's grappled, the creature can't use actions with the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) trait or cast spells with a verbal component.

</column>
name: Sludgespine Killers
